https://tmrev.io/movie/57687-Die Beauty 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a4bLEJkgLXAWkEhdOjWVBOjDY1D.jpg Die Beauty is a surreal thriller in a feverish fairytale world. A story about friendship and alienation, family ties and kindred blood.A group of girls want something to happen. Something that will make everything change. A dead body floating down the river would be exciting. And if you wish for something hard enough... Die Beauty
